commitResults.messageTitle: Change name of the bot and add greeting and exit words
commitResults.messageBody: Rewrite the src/main/java/Duke.java to allow for the changes mentioned in the subject line.
Create a BotManager class to take care of all reponses that will be generated by the bot. Some codes in the previous commit is moved to the BotManager class.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add "add" and "list" function to the bot
commitResults.messageBody: Modify the void answer(String prompt) function to allow the bot to add tasks and list all the tasks added.
Create a new Task class to facilitate the increasingly complicated features, and make amendment to the BotManager in accordance.
Add the subclasses as they present similar behavior. Rewrite some methods in BotManager for better clarity. Make Task class abstract as only the subclasses are dealt with.
Modify the test files to facilitate the varying features of the bot. Make mild changes to the BotManager.java to adapt to the comparisons.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add DukeException.java. Make abundant modification to BotManager.java
commitResults.messageBody:
Add DukeException class that deals with invalid inputs. Change much in the implementation of BotManager to catch DukeException. Add an extra interface to Task class to consider marginal scenarios.

This version needs further improvement to be more punctual when dealing with task creation. Should make distinction between information missing and incorrect format.
Add a deleteTask function to allow for deleting tasks from the collection.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add File attribute to the BotManager
commitResults.messageBody:
Make mass modification to the code in BotManager.java to adapt to the new attributes. Any change of the current tasks invokes change in the file. Use the file to store tasks given a certain format.

Ignore the temporarily generated duke.txt file.

Modify the type of date-related strings to a specialized LocalDateTime class to manage the timestamps of tasks. Modify the toString() and file I/O methods to adapt to these changes. Add searchDate(LocalDate) function to BotManager to alllow users to search tasks by specific dates.

Make mild changes to satisfy the coding standards.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor the codes to make the project more OOP-styled
commitResults.messageBody:
Add Parser class to analyze user's input. Add Storage class to deal with file management. Add TaskList class to temporary store all tasks during the execution of program. Add Ui class for user interaction.

Make changes to other parts of codes to adapt to these major changes. Also make minor changes in accordance with the coding standard.

commitResults.messageTitle: Organize all java files into 2 packages.
commitResults.messageBody: The command classes and other class files are kept separately.

Test Parser.parse to see whether it can deliver commands correctly. Test Event.matchDate to see if it can filter events with the corresponding dates.

Override equals method for command classes to make comparisons.

commitResults.messageTitle: Modify build.gradle to support JAR file creation
Add JavaDoc files to all the non-private methods and classes.
Make minor to the codes to make them satisfy the coding standards

commitResults.messageBody: Add SearchDateCommand to allow for searching tasks with certain keywords. Make minor changes to other parts of codes to adapt to the new feature.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add GUI to the whole program
commitResults.messageBody: Add GUI to the program using FXML. Make mass change to the code. Reformat the logics.
Add a new package to deal with GUI implementation. Modify getResponse(String input) in duke.Duke to allow for more conversation. Make modification to other parts of the code accordingly.
Add "assert" keyword in the code to increase readability. Make Minor changes in the coding format to satisfy the coding standards.
Modify the header comments in several parts of the codes to increase readability.
Add Assert feature.
Increase the quality of codes

* 'master' of https://github.com/JerryWang0000/ip:
  Increase the quality of code

Make modification to the original searchDate function in TaskList to sort all tasks in chronological order, and include all Todo tasks.

Add a new TsakWithTime interface to allow for comparisons among tasks and conform to ISP.

Modify Parse.parse to reduce ambiguity.
Modify the search date feature

* 'master' of https://github.com/JerryWang0000/ip:
  Modify the search date feature
Make modification to the FXML file to renovate the layout of GUI. Add a title to the stage to make the program more personalized.

commitResults.messageTitle: Make minor changes to the layout of DialogBox

commitResults.messageBody: Update README.md to include a user guide to the program. Make minor changes to other parts of the codes to allow for more flexibility.
